about_the_game:
Get ready to embark on an unforgettable adventure with Oxygen Cocktail - an open-world visual novel game that seamlessly blends elements of adventure and storytelling. You will take on the role of a child who spends their summer in a quaint village with their parents, discovering the hidden secrets that lie within.

As you journey through the village, you'll encounter various fascinating characters with unique stories and personalities. You'll help solve problems, make new friends, and unravel the mysteries of the surrounding environment.

The world of Oxygen Cocktail is brought to life through stunning isometric pixel-art visuals combined with other styles to create a truly unique aesthetic. The game boasts a captivating soundtrack and storyline that will keep you hooked from start to finish.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of rural areas, relive childhood memories, and experience the magic of Oxygen Cocktail. The game promises a one-of-a-kind gaming experience that you won't soon forget.



Featuring:
  • Open-world adventure: Explore a charming rural village and its surrounding environment
  • Unique aesthetic: Experience a seamless blend of isometric pixel art and other styles, creating a truly unique visual experience
  • Engaging storytelling: Uncover secrets and solve puzzles as you interact with a cast of fascinating characters
  • Immersive soundtrack: Enjoy a captivating soundtrack that enhances the game's overall atmosphere
